decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (15/36/SAH/301 - Existing and Proposed Plans and Block Plans and 15/36/SAH/302 - Existing and Proposed Elevations - Received: 14/12/2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - The windows formed in the flank elevation shall be obscure glazed and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.
description: Erection of a front porch to the house
